title: Did Belusi say "civilization as we know today is in Staki's about the 2020 elections?
subtitle: Whether accurate or not, a common online quote can travel very quickly away from its original context.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Pelosi, said "civilization as we know it today is at stake" with regard to the 2020 presidential election.
